EmailTemplate.name: ACI - Workstation Activation
EmailTemplate.Body:
ACI Workstation RSA Setup Information

The Global Service Desk has created you an ACI user ID

Name: $!{identityName}
Activation URL: https://mytoken.aciworldwide.com:443/ctkip/services/CtkipService
Workstation RSA Activation Code: $!{RSAcode}
Additional Information: Instructions are included to set it up.
  1. Open the RSA app on your workstation
  2. Copy and paste the information provided above in the appropriate fields

**If you do not have the desktop RSA software installed yet, please contact the Global Service Desk at the number listed below.

Please contact the Global Service Desk at +1 (855) ACI-DESK in the US & Canada or +1 (404) 923-6600 for international locations if you have any questions or concerns.
